title: About Rrish
subtitle: Passionate Educator. Blues Improviser. Musical Guide.
content: Music has been my constant companion for over 5 years, evolving from a personal journey into blues improvisation to a multifaceted musical career. Today, I serve the Melbourne music community as an educator, performer, and collaborator - helping others discover their own musical voice while bringing authentic live music to diverse audiences.

Based in Melbourne, I specialize in guitar improvisation with a focus on blues foundations while drawing from pop, rock, and acoustic styles. My performance experience across Melbourne's live music scene enriches both my teaching approach and collaborative work, bringing real-world musical insight into every interaction.

As both performer and educator, I offer a unique perspective on music-making. Whether I'm teaching students in personalized lessons, performing for wedding couples and corporate audiences, or collaborating with fellow musicians on creative projects, my focus remains consistent: helping everyone discover that music is a language we can all speak authentically.

My integrated approach means students benefit from performance-tested techniques, audiences experience teaching-informed musical communication, and collaborators work with someone who understands music from multiple perspectives. This multi-service foundation creates richer musical experiences across all touchpoints.
